abstract: William T. Winters, a former top executive at JPMorgan, has teamed up with the investment firms of Jacob Rothschild and Johann Rupert to set up an asset management and advisory firm in London.
snippet: William T. Winters, a former top executive at JPMorgan, has teamed up with the investment firms of Jacob Rothschild and Johann Rupert to set up an asset management and advisory firm in London.
lead_paragraph: William T. Winters, a former senior executive at JPMorgan Chase, has teamed up with the investment firms of Jacob Rothschild and the South African billionaire Johann P. Rupert to set up an asset management and advisory firm in London.

headline.main: Former JPMorgan Executive Starts Advisory Firm

abstract: Naguib Kheraj, chief executive of Lazard International, resigned after less than two months in the job to focus on his work with the Aga Khan Development Network.
snippet: Naguib Kheraj, chief executive of Lazard International, resigned after less than two months in the job to focus on his work with the Aga Khan Development Network.
lead_paragraph: Naguib Kheraj, the chief executive of Lazard International, resigned on Thursday after less than two months in the job to focus on his philanthropic work with the Aga Khan Development Network.

headline.main: Lazard Officer Resigns to Focus on Charity Work

abstract: The value of the restricted stock grant to JPMorgan’s chief executive is 50 percent higher than it was last year, but the bank’s earnings rose 48 percent in 2010.
snippet: The value of the restricted stock grant to JPMorgan’s chief executive is 50 percent higher than it was last year, but the bank’s earnings rose 48 percent in 2010.

headline.main: JPMorgan Gives Dimon a $17 Million Payday
